TopicTitle: moderators randomly deleting posts without notice?

Articles.Content:
i could have sworn i posted the dev interview from ShadowZone here, but apparently it got removed lol

what is this? xD

usually at least im being notified when im breaking any rules or something...

EDIT: ok so apparently they merged my thread to a place where the sun doesnt shine, i wonder why xD
but even in this case im usually being notified...

Edited March 7, 2023 by Fullmetal Analyst

Hi @Fullmetal Analyst, with the release of KSP 2 the moderation team is trying to merge as many bug reports as possible so the devs have a better idea of the most common bugs. Due to the high number of merges we are notifying in thread instead of notifying individual members because of the current increased workload. If you feel a thread has been moved or merged incorrectly please report the thread or comment and we will look into it.

Also thread moved from KSP 2 Discussion to Kerbal Network as this is topic is about the forum as opposed to the game.

Edited March 7, 2023 by James Kerman
Added move.
